name: The Power of 45 Brains (Bolt)
description:
I think the game is playable.

Take on the power of the brains in a never ending onslaught of laser filled goodness rendered with slick GPU accelerated ray tracing.

Beware this game requires some pretty beefy hardware to run it smoothly...

You can press tab to eject the current clip and right click toggles slow mo if you have any. should be all the controls you need.
